thread.title: Soon You'll Be Able To Scream-Sing Along To "Moana" In Theaters
thread.title_full: Soon You'll Be Able To Scream-Sing Along To "Moana" In Theaters

author: Keely Flaherty
title: Soon You'll Be Able To Scream-Sing Along To "Moana" In Theaters
text:
View this image ›
Disney ID: 10300986 2. Maybe you really loved “How Far I’ll Go” and learned it in 24 different languages . Maybe you know every lyric to “You’re Welcome.” Or maybe “Shiny” is more your jam. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301010 3. Well, great news: No matter what your fave Moana song is, soon you’ll be able to sing it in theaters at the top of your lungs! A sing-along version of the film is being released on Jan. 27 in more than 2,000 theaters nationwide. View this image ›
Disney And if you live in Los Angeles, you can see it even sooner. Sing-along screenings begin Jan. 20 at Hollywood’s El Capitan Theatre, with daily showtimes at 9:30 a.m. and 12:30 p.m.
ID: 10301037 4. And if you don’t have all the lyrics memorized yet, worry not — the sing-along version includes includes on-screen lyrics. So feel free to belt out every line of “How Far I’ll Go” with zero shame. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10301058 ID: 10301122
